kv22.4:1.3: Atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ, dhammasākacchā, paripucchā, sīlasamādānaṁ, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogoti?
kv22.4:1.5: natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ …pe… pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogoti?
kv22.4:1.7: Hañci natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ …pe… pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv22.4:2.4: parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāroti?
kv22.4:2.7: parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāro, no ca vata re vattabbe—
